multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is the right description of The Scope of Work?

choicegroup.choice: It shows the negatiation on the work to be performed in the project.
It shows the agreement on the work to be performed in the project. It also shows the milestones, timeline, deliverables, and final products that are expected to be provided
It documents the objectives, scope, high-level implemenation plan and deliverables of the project. And it is used to officially assign the project manager to the project
It is used to officially assign the project manager to the project
